entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6 except plus 3 over western sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6 except plus 3 over western sections. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
